# SKX Labs | Strategic Intelligence Brief
> [cite_start]Recovering the $2.1M AI Visibility Gap for Global Whales. [cite: 75, 77, 101]

## [cite_start]Core Capabilities [cite: 104]
- [cite_start]**AEO (Answer Engine Optimization)**: Signal architecture for AI synthesis. [cite: 107, 109]
- [cite_start]**GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)**: Structural alignment for LLM prioritization. [cite: 110, 112]
- [cite_start]**LLMO (Large Language Model Optimization)**: Epistemological positioning in training loops. [cite: 113, 116]
